About

  The Redirection Tool allows the management of the aliases stored in
  "plone.app.redirector":http://pypi.python.org/pypi/plone.app.redirector.

Using The RedirectionTool

  To use this product, simply click on the aliases tab in any plone content
  type and type the alternative Short Name or an absolute path where this
  alias should exist.

Credits

  Originally created by Helge Tesdal at
  "Plone Solutions":http://www.plonesolutions.com sponsored by
  "Learning Lab Denmark":http://www.lld.dk.

  Updated for Plone 3 by Florian Schulze at
  "Plone Solutions":http://www.plonesolutions.com.

  The Redirection Tool is released under the GPL licence.
